The '''Flaming Arrow Warhead''' is a technique used by [[Nagato]] through the [[Asura Path (character)|Asura Path]].

== Overview ==
Using the body modification ability of the [[Asura Path]], the user detaches their hand, revealing a cluster of missiles. The further the hand is removed from the arm, the more missiles can be fired at once. These can fired to create widespread damage, or as homing devices seeking a single target. Even if the Asura Path has sustained significant damage, it can still produce missiles from its body, as it did when Pain attempted to kill Chōji.

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the anime and manga, it was named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution]]''.
